member.name: M:Web.Controllers.IdentityController.Post(Application.Dto.User.LoginUserDto)
member.summary: Endpoint handling user authentication. If he pass proccess sucesfully, controller will return access token.

member.name: M:Web.Controllers.IdentityController.Post(Application.Dto.User.RegisterUserDto)
member.summary: Endpoint handling registration user instance to system
member.param: Informations required to create user instance

member.name: M:Web.Controllers.IdentityController.Post(Application.Dto.Identity.RefreshTokenDto)
member.summary: Endpoint handling generation of new access tokens for sign-in users after expire
member.returns: Object wit access token and metadata

member.name: M:Web.Controllers.IdentityController.Put(Application.Dto.Identity.RevokeTokenDto)
member.summary: Endpoint handling process of expiration refresh tokens, after invoke this operation if user will try to generate new token from expired refresh in session he will recive exception
